conbody.p: The Symbian platform provides the following browser APIs:

li.p: Browser Plug-in API: This API allows you to develop browser plug-ins for the Symbian platform.
Browser Control API: This API allows you to embed the Symbian platform browser within an application.

conbody.p: The following Symbian platform APIs are also related to browsing:

section.title: Additional information
section.p: For general information on browsing options and access to browsing documentation and tools, see:

li.p: Web technologies at the Symbian Foundation.

section.p: For information on formats and codecs supported by the Symbian platform, see the feature tables on Forum Nokia: audio codecs and video codecs.
